website_summaries.verdict: An AC-powered charger that will keep your bull in. Comes in several sizes to meet your needs.
pros: This charger delivers a strong shock but isn't dangerous for humans
Helps to keep your animals in during storms because it includes a lightning protection feature
Works with fewer ground rods than other chargers
cons: This unit is not weatherproof and is designed to be installed indoors in a weatherproof location

customer_reviews.title: While installing the charger, some repairs were needed on ...
customer_reviews.text: While installing the charger, some repairs were needed on the fence, My helper, when I was some 500 feet away from the charger plugged the unit in before I was done. I ended up on my butt from the reaction to the shock. Even with a partially shorted fence, it works. I have cattle and a Mule. They really respect this fence and so do I! Even with wet grass shorts it keeps in excess of 6kV.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Tolleth

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best
customer_reviews.text: I have had many many fence chargers, and currently run several different ones Gallagher included, I have the Cyclops Boss which has taken over as my primary. This is by far the best Fence Charger out there, it will give a wollup your livestock will remember, even calves don't get out. I have dealt with the company for repairs too, awesome customer service... It's expensive but very well worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Robert Larson

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Great strength and power. Strong zap. Weeds need to be trimmed and need to be careful of shorts. But angus heifers, cows and bulls all respect single wire. Does a good job keeping them inside the fence. Currently have 15-20 acres fenced and lots of turns and curves in fence line. Full power over 7,000 volts all the way through. Fence tester only goes to 7,000 and it’s bright! After a few days and training, the pigs didn’t bother the single strand for a few months thereafter.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E. Nuffer

customer_reviews.title: Great fence charger for Large Stubborn goats!
customer_reviews.text: The Cyclops Super fence charger works excellently in keeping in our French Alpine Buck. He is 190 lbs of Rut... and respects this fence!! We originally purchased the Champ, but he was not phased by it at all. (He is a long haired goat) With the aid of excellent customer service on the sellers part and Amazon Primes easy return policy, I was quickly refunded for the first unit purchased and quickly bought a more powerful unit. I would definitely recommend this product!!! A+
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The bull DOES stop here!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a no BS charger. I used this to replace a so called “hot charger” typically found at the Farm store, and no comparison whatsoever! This thing packs some punch. Even with not so clean fence the cattle don’t want any part of it, and bulls only test it once. I will be replacing all three on the farm with the cyclops now, very happy. Make sure to ground properly as instructed.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Hews

customer_reviews.title: Plenty powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I was using a different brand solar fence charger to keep my cows on one side of the pasture. Cows would go straight through it. Ordered this and it took the cows about 5 minutes to decide they didn't want to be anywhere near the electric fence! Tons of power! I will be using cyclops for all my fence charger needs from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ona M.

customer_reviews.title: I received a nice surprise opening barn
customer_reviews.text: Charger does its job. If grounded properly, it will keep animals out and/or in, depending on your situation. When my grounding failed, electricity decided to use my horse barn as ground. I received a nice surprise opening barn. Customer service is great. Give them a call and you are talking to someone involved in the design of the product with a wealth of information.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel A.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and positive or fencer knob was laying in bottom of box. The ground knob had the ground post tightened so hard I could not remove it without breaking the knob trying to get post out. I am not impressed with such an expensive unit having such poor quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: CSSC

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, will expand !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Whoa, this is a monster !!!! I love it No Bull, this will regulate the mind if they can’t make a decision to stay off the line. It’s got a tick so it’s good if u can put it away so it can’t be heard. Any animal will get smart enough to pair noise, no tick no shock.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping my fence charged to keep the cows inside fence!
customer_reviews.author: D Horne

customer_reviews.title: Best charger I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: I've used farm store fencers my whole life. Cheap junk hidden in a big box. This charger is heavy and well built. I've also been shocked several times in my life. During the installation I touched one of the wires with insulated pliers. It got me. This is by far the strongest shock I've ever recieved.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan acree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you install the correct number of ground rods
customer_reviews.author: Tony H

customer_reviews.title: Deer Away!
customer_reviews.text: No more deer in the garden with this thing! I was having major problems with whitetail deer eating my garden. My okra looked like stick people and the peas were ruined. I haven't seen a single deer or deer track anywhere near the garden for weeks!
customer_reviews.author: R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: What you want
customer_reviews.text: Got the 5 joule on two miles of wire. Packs a wallop. Cows will not cross even when deer knock a wire down. Lightning hit in a bad storm and it knocked out the power to the property but the charger was fine when the coop got power back up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nonny Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Best Charger
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t own anything else. Buy far the best charger out there. Customer service is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: keeps my chickens safe nothing gets past it its awesome. had trouble with raccoons now I don't.
customer_reviews.author: scrunt man

customer_reviews.title: Don’t touch this one
customer_reviews.text: Very best electric fence box on market. Holds voltage strong on all fencing.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Boyette

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: gave out after 2 years... did keep the animals back.
customer_reviews.author: Brady Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Cyclops Super
customer_reviews.text: 2 weeks after hooking the charger up a wind shear blew a hay feeder into the fence causing a direct short. Before I removed it I took a voltage reading 5.5kV removed it and it went to 7.6 kV. With other fence chargers the voltage would have collapsed causing the effectiveness of the fence to down. I rest at night knowing the Cyclops is working even in emergency situations.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gurney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our small dry lot.
customer_reviews.text: Works great horses are now staying in. Just hot enough to keep the 2 acres of dry lot comfortably hot that if Kids accidentally touch the fence it is not a catastrophe.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Cyclops Hero Charger
customer_reviews.text: Product works fine, does the job I purchased it for and is easily installed. Would recommend if you need a charger!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: It works and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: If you have animals that are hard to keep inside a fence, then this is the right charger. We have sheep and with other chargers the sheep hardly knew the fence is hot and would get out. With this charger, they KNOW the fence is hot! Even sheep with heavy wool respect the fence now.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Scholle

customer_reviews.title: Not UL listed
customer_reviews.text: This is a dangerous product and should not be for sale. It is attractive that it is USA made, however it is not UL listed and will not run on GFCI circuit. There is no safe way to use it. Since its an outdoor product it must be operated on a GFCI per NEC.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Great charger👍
customer_reviews.text: Greatest charger I’ve ever had. Super strong and great customer service if you need help. I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey fowler

product_meta.title: Cyclops Brute - 8 Joule Fence Charger - AC
product_meta.description: Size:8 JouleAll Taylor Fence models output a wide pulse which puts the hurt in the pulse which gets and keeps the respect of the animals. The Taylor Fence lab has the ability to calculate stored or output joules for any model. They will gladly test any unit for comparison. Don't be fooled by mileage ratings which are just an approximation of power but go by the electric Joule power rating. Through their commitment, experience, and expertise, Taylor Fence has established a business relationship with their customers that will last a lifetime!
feature_bullets: Strongest Line, Battery and Solar Operated Chargers Built in the USA - 100 acres - 8 miles of protection
Strongest Lightning Protection in the World
Built in the U.S.A. / Unsurpassed Animal Holding Power

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
